data.title: गुनाहों का देवता [Gunahon Ka Devata] — Reader Q&A
data.meta_description: Readers’ questions about गुनाहों का देवता [Gunahon Ka Devata]. 3 questions answered.
data.text:
Swati Sharma One of the best Novel in Hindi Literature.

Sudha & Chandar's characters created Beautifully by Dharamvir ji.

Interesting Characters are not only those,…moreOne of the best Novel in Hindi Literature.

Sudha & Chandar's characters created Beautifully by Dharamvir ji.

Interesting Characters are not only those, Pummi and Shukla ji's also humorous characters by Writers.(less)

Isha Gupta For sure. Anyone who reads it will surely feel that what a regressive novel. And its true. It is. Being a hard core feminist, these kind of novels jus…moreFor sure. Anyone who reads it will surely feel that what a regressive novel. And its true. It is. Being a hard core feminist, these kind of novels just make me wanna puke. But here is the thing. The story is regressive, because the society itself was. So it's a mirror to that time. Also the reason why is celebrated probably is compared to the current times. Here we see love being cheated on for so many reasons. But here sudha and chandars love is pure. Pious. Unsaid. (less)
